questions.text: Have you personally handled candidate sourcing for open positions?
How many years of experience do you have in candidate sourcing?

questions.text: Have you supported sourcing activities indirectly or assisted recruiters?

Have you worked with recruitment agencies?

questions.text: How do you coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring managers?
